title: Orange mousse
ingredients: ['3 eggs, separated', '125g caster sugar', '1 tbsp cornflour', 'grated zest of 1 lime', '250ml freshly-squeezed orange juice', '1 tbsp Cointreau or Grand Marnier (optional)', 'pinch of salt', 'TO DECORATE', 'fine strips of orange and lime zest', 'sprigs of fresh mint']
